trends: There have been no other sightings in Howard City
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Last year during deer season I saw a ufo.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I had came in from hunting,we were sitting on the couch,ourshow had just came on and I noticed a white light out the window,thenimmediately another behind it. I jumped up and ranout onto the deck, telling myson to come out. We stood on the deck and watched it, it was coming in on abouta 30 degree angle. It was moving moderately slow. My first reaction was that itwas crashing. There was 5 colored lights on it and it was shaped like a ... wellkind of like a submarine with big windows. The woods started cracking andsnapping and my son and I looked at each other,we couldnt believe it.I swore itcrashed.. We woke up my other son and ran out the front door, and we werelooking at the sky and we saw 4 or 5 jets in the sky and they were circling inthe sky above the house. There was a smoke trail right above my house.
